snippet.title: Endocrisis - Trailer 2
snippet.description:
Add Endocrisis to your Steam Wishlist
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1507860/Endocrisis

This trailer explains the movements or actions that we can perform in #Endocrisis

The most important is Absorb, which allows us to regain power and consume enemy bullets, at the same time that we move faster.
